pluginstrument.author: Jack Zero
pluginstrument.description: Captain side PFD overlay for Ddenn's Bombardier Challenger 300. Note that the PFD overlay only contains a few overlays to handle the Challenger's menu system. To work properly a XHSI PFD and ND are required below the instrument. Two matching XHSI config files are included, one for the full resolution of 670x895 on the left side of a 1440x900 screen and one for a scaled down version of the instrument using the resolution of 536x716 required for the full 1920x1080 touchscreen cockpit. Also note that my (unofficial) patch 10.36 Patch 2 for the 10.36 version of the Challenger is required, see: http://forums.x-plane.org/index.php?showtopic=87865
